title: Online Electoral System (Programming Fundamentals)
description:
A project designed in C/C++ providing users the facility of voting sitting at their homes and voting at their own ease.
It provides with two Interfaces, a Voter who can login,sign-up or cast its vote and an Admin who can view and manage all the data of the User’s as well as the candidates of the Election.

title: Online Elecctoral System (OOP )
description:
A project designed in C/C++ providing users the facility of voting sitting at their homes and voting at their own ease.
It provides with two Interfaces, a Voter who can login,sign-up or cast its vote and an Admin who can view and manage all the data of the User’s as well as the candidates of the Election.

title: Data Structure on Pwned Password Dataset
description: Used Multithreading Sha-1 encryption AVL tree searching to show the pwned passwords and the number of times each of them had been detected.

title: Electronic Dictionary
description: Searching for the meaning of word entered by the User Designed in Assembly Language

title: Sorting Algorithms visualizer
description: An Interface that is designed using Python to visualise various sorting algorithms for a better understanding of how each sorting algorithm operates.Designed the visualization of 10 different algorithms including Insertion sort,

title: Inventory Management System
description: Assigns an Inventory to Retailer requesting it and helps him managing his inventory by providing options such as Adding Product, Delete Product , Update Product and Several Validations checks for Data Entry
